charges.charge_description: CT 1: 18:92(g)(1) possession of firearm by a person convicted of crime punishable by imprisonment for a term exceeding one year (1)

charges.charge_disposition: BOP impr 36 mo; SUP REL 36 mo; additional conditions:Dft shall submit to search of person, property, vehicles, business &; residence to be conducted in a reasonable manner &; at reasonable time. Dft shall provide the probation access to any requested financial info. Dft shall pay a fine in amt of $2000. to be pd in full 90 days prior to expiration of sup rel term. SA $100. (1)
